title: Is there a travel surcharge?
content: There is 1 hour of travel accomodated for in all packages. If your location requires longer than 1 hour total for travel, there is an surcharge of $50 per hour. However, compensation for accommodation may also be required with prior discussion.

title: Do you require a deposit for your wedding photography?
content: Yes, I require a 25% deposit to secure your booking, with the remainder due 14 days prior to the wedding.

title: How do I receive my images?
content: You will receive your gallery through a private online gallery ready to be downloaded to your desired device.
